ingredients: 3 tablespoons fish sauce, plus more to taste
1 tablespoon palm sugar or light brown sugar
1 puya or other small, mild chili, roughly chopped
1 árbol or other small dried, red chili, torn
1½ poached, roasted or grilled skinless chicken breasts
2 tablespoons rice bran or olive oil
½ cup roughly chopped Thai or other basil
